imdb.plot outline: The hilarious Ester Goldberg brings Las Vegas to the world for the very first time in a brand new series. Sin City has the biggest stars, biggest shows, biggest nightclubs, biggest pool Parties, best restaurants, best fights, the best of everything 7 days a weeks 24 seven. Deliriously Fabulous Vegas is the first show to bring the ever changing Entertainment Capital of the World every week.
imdb.title: Deliriously Fabulous Vegas
plot: The hilarious Ester Goldberg brings Las Vegas to the world for the very first time in a brand new series. Sin City has the biggest stars, biggest shows, biggest nightclubs, biggest pool Parties, best restaurants, best fights, the best of everything 7 days a weeks 24 seven. _Deliriously Fabulous Vegas_ (qv) is the first show to bring the ever changing Entertainment Capital of the World every week.::Michael Airington
